thread.title: AIRSHOW-Boeing should decide on new mid-sized jet this year to meet 2025 target -GE exec

author: Reuters Editorial
title: AIRSHOW-Boeing should decide on new mid-sized jet this year to meet 2025 target -GE exec
text:
February 5, 2018 / 6:34 AM / in 7 minutes AIRSHOW-Boeing should decide on new mid-sized jet this year to meet 2025 target -GE exec Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
SINGAPORE, Feb 5 (Reuters) - Boeing Co needs to make a decision on whether to launch a new mid-sized jet this year to be able to deliver it to customers by around 2025, a GE executive said on Monday. 
“Time is running short,” GE Aviation general manager of global sales and marketing Chaker Chahrour said during a panel session at the Singapore Airshow Aviation Leadership Summit. “If this is an airplane that wants to enter service in a 2025 timeframe I would guess a decision needs to be made this year.” 
He said GE was interested in supplying engines for Boeing’s potential jet, which if in the 50,000 pound thrust range as it expected, would be done through its CFM joint venture with Safran SA. (Reporting by Jamie Freed Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman)
